## Function: SB-KERNEL:SIGNAL-COLD-INIT-OR-REINIT
[![package](https://img.shields.io/badge/Package-SB--KERNEL-5f9ea0.svg?style=social&colorA=999999)](../) [![type](https://img.shields.io/badge/Type-Function-5f9ea0.svg?style=social&colorA=999999)](../#function) [![github](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-View_the_source-5f9ea0.svg?style=social&colorA=999999&logo=github)](https://github.com/sbcl/sbcl/blob/master/src/code/target-signal.lisp/) 

> Enable all the default signals that Lisp knows how to deal with.
